title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning Instructional Design for Immersive Art History Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic art history terminology and overview of Western art history
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze major artworks in their spatial context using 360-degree virtual gallery navigation technology.
Learners can explain the production techniques and historical backgrounds of artworks through AR-based interactive activities.
Learners can submit art education design proposals incorporating peer assessment feedback via mobile quizzes and discussion forums.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
